metadata.Title: CVE-2014-2328 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
lib/graph_export.php in Cacti 0.8.7g, 0.8.8b, and earlier allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-2328` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 0.8.8b+dfsg-5
No subscription required

notes.Note: seth-arnold> No details publicly known yet

criterions.comment: cacti package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.8b+dfsg-5').
